original_text: All around its edge, below the top, there were two rows of images of things that looked like bulls. They were all part of the same piece of bronze as the big bath. There were 20 bulls for every metre around the edge.
korean_text: 그 가장자리 아래에는 돌아가며 소 형상이 있는데 각 규빗에 소가 열 마리씩 있어서 바다 주위에 둘렸으니 그 소는 바다를 부어 만들 때에 두 줄로 부어 만들었으며

sentences.original_text: there were two rows of images
of things that looked like bulls
They were all part of the same piece of bronze
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 모두 동일한 청동 조각의 일부였습니다

sentences.original_text: There were 20 bulls for every metre
